snippet: A congressman who visited Guantánamo recently said the most requested book among the detainees was the erotic novel “Fifty Shades of Grey,” but an Associated Press report casts doubt on the claim.
abstract: A congressman who visited Guantánamo recently said the most requested book among the detainees was the erotic novel “Fifty Shades of Grey,” but an Associated Press report casts doubt on the claim.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Guantánamo Officials Accused of Inventing 'Fifty Shades of Grey' Rumor
